chatsupport

Class ChatDBOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatsupport.ChatDBOperations

  • public class ChatDBOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to connect to the chatsystem database and perform a set of fixed operations on this database. These operations are then used by the ChatWebService to provide the necessary functionality for the chat application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatDBOperations()
      The constructor for the class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatDBOperations

        public ChatDBOperations()
        The constructor for the class. This connects to a copy of the database on your local machine and initializes the connection and statement objects.

    • Method Detail

      • checkLogin

        public int checkLogin(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        This method is used to check login credentials against the database and returns the unique user id if the supplied details are correct.
        Parameters:
        username - the username you use to login.
        password - the password you use to login.
        Returns:
        either:
        • the unique user id of the logged in user (this will be an integer greater than 0).
        • 0 if no user with the credentials can be found.
        • -2 if there is an SQLException.
        • -1 if there is a general failure for other reasons.

      • registerUser

        public int registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String rptpassword)
        This method is used to create a new user on the database and returns the unique user id if the supplied details are correct. Note: password is encrypted using SHA2-256.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new user.
        username - the username of the new user.
        password - the password for the new user.
        rptpassword - the password entered again.
        Returns:
        either:
        • the unique user id of the new user (this will be an integer greater than 0).
        • 0 if no user with the credentials can be found.
        • -3 if there is an SQLException.
        • -2 if both passwords don't match.
        • -1 if user with that username already exist.

      • newSession

        public int newSession(int uid)
        This method is used to create a new session on the database and returns the unique session ID. Messages cannot be posted or retrieved unless a session is being established.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user ID.
        Returns:
        the session unique ID.

      • logOut

        public boolean logOut(int uid,
                      int sid)
        This method is used to terminate the existing user session.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user ID.
        sid - the session ID.
        Returns:
        returns true if successful, and false otherwise.

      • postMessage

        public boolean postMessage(int uid,
                           int sid,
                           java.lang.String receiver,
                           java.lang.String message)
        This method sends a message to another user.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user ID.
        sid - the session ID.
        receiver - the username of the receiver.
        message - the message to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

      • getMessages

        public Message[] getMessages(int uid,
                             int sid,
                             java.lang.String receiver,
                             int mid)
        This method retrieves messages between two users.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user ID of the current user.
        sid - the session ID.
        receiver - the username of the other user.
        mid - the message ID threshold. All messages with message IDs larger than that number will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the messages returned in a Message array chronologically (see class Message).

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String[] getUsers(boolean asc)
        This method retrieves all registered users.
        Parameters:
        asc - if set to true, returns the users in alphabetical order.
        Returns:
        the users in a String array.

      • postMulticast

        public boolean postMulticast(int uid,
                             int sid,
                             java.lang.String message)
        This method sends a message to all users.
        Parameters:
        uid - the user ID.
        sid - the session ID.
        message - the message to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, and false otherwise.

      • getMulticast

        public Message[] getMulticast(int sid,
                              int mid)
        This method retrieves Multicast messages.
        Parameters:
        sid - the session ID.
        mid - the message ID threshold. All messages with message IDs larger than that number will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the messages returned in a Message array chronologically (see class Message).

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method terminates the connection to the DB and frees the resources.
